    • Method Detail

      • canSource

        boolean canSource(Stereotype stereotype,
                MClass link,
                MClass from)
        Tells whether a link can have the given source.
        Parameters:
        stereotype - The stereotype of the link.
        link - The link to test.
        from - The source of the link element.
        Returns:
        true if the source is accepted, else false.

      • canTarget

        boolean canTarget(Stereotype stereotype,
                MClass link,
                MClass from)
        /** Tells whether a link can have the given target.
        Parameters:
        stereotype - The stereotype of the link.
        link - The link to test.
        from - The target of the link element.
        Returns:
        true if the target is accepted, else false.

      • canLink

        boolean canLink(Stereotype stereotypedLink,
              MClass link,
              MObject from,
              MObject to)
        Tells whether a stereotyped link can have the given source, destination and owner.
        Parameters:
        owner - The optional owner of the link element. Used for link that have a specific owner.
        stereotypedLink - the stereotype put on the link to check.
        link - the link to check.
        from - The source of the link element.
        to - The target of the link element.
        Returns:
        true if the link can be created, else false.
